description: Apple designs consumer electronic devices, including smartphones, computers, and wearables.
Microsoft develops and licenses software, including Windows and Office.
NVIDIA designs graphics processing units for gaming and data centers.
Amazon operates e-commerce platforms and cloud computing services.
Google provides search, advertising, and cloud products.
Meta operates social networking platforms and messaging services.
Tesla designs electric vehicles, energy storage, and solar products.
Broadcom designs semiconductors and infrastructure software.
TSMC is a leading independent semiconductor foundry.
Tencent provides internet services, gaming, and payments.
ASML makes lithography systems used in chip manufacturing.
Oracle provides database and enterprise cloud software.
Netflix operates a global streaming entertainment service.
Adobe builds creative, document, and marketing software.
Salesforce provides cloud CRM and enterprise applications.
Intel designs and manufactures microprocessors and chipsets.
AMD designs CPUs and GPUs for PCs and data centers.
Qualcomm designs wireless chipsets and licensing technology.
Cisco provides networking hardware and software solutions.
SAP provides enterprise resource planning software.
JPMorgan Chase provides banking and financial services globally.
Bank of America provides consumer and commercial banking.
Visa operates a global electronic payment network.
Mastercard provides payment processing services worldwide.
PayPal operates online payments and money transfers.
Block provides payment and financial technology services.
Goldman Sachs provides investment banking and asset management.
Morgan Stanley provides investment banking and wealth management.
American Express provides charge and credit card services.
Intuit develops financial management and tax software.
Wells Fargo provides banking, lending, and wealth services.
Citigroup provides banking and financial services globally.
BNY Mellon provides asset servicing and management.
U.S. Bancorp provides consumer and commercial banking.
Schwab provides brokerage, banking, and asset management.
BlackRock provides asset management and investment services.
PNC provides retail and corporate banking services.
Truist provides banking, lending, and wealth services.
Capital One provides credit cards and consumer banking.
CME operates derivatives and futures exchanges.
NextEra Energy is a leading producer of wind and solar power.
Enphase designs solar micro-inverters and energy systems.
First Solar manufactures thin film solar modules.
Vestas designs and manufactures wind turbines.
Orsted develops and operates offshore wind farms.
Exxon Mobil explores and produces oil and gas globally.
Chevron engages in petroleum and natural gas operations.
BP is a global integrated oil and gas company.
TotalEnergies is a multinational integrated energy company.
Shell operates in oil, gas, and energy transition businesses.
ConocoPhillips produces crude oil and natural gas.
SLB provides oilfield services and technology.
EOG explores and produces crude oil and natural gas.
Phillips 66 operates refining, midstream, and marketing.
Marathon Petroleum operates refining and midstream assets.
Valero operates oil refineries and ethanol plants.
ONEOK provides natural gas gathering and processing.
Kinder Morgan operates pipelines and terminals.
Halliburton provides drilling and completion services.
Enbridge operates energy transportation infrastructure.
Johnson & Johnson develops pharmaceuticals and medical devices.
Pfizer develops medicines and vaccines.
Merck develops pharmaceuticals and vaccines.
Novartis develops innovative medicines.
Roche develops pharmaceuticals and diagnostics.
Amgen develops biologic medicines for serious diseases.
Gilead develops antivirals and specialty medicines.
Biogen develops therapies for neurological diseases.
Regeneron develops medicines for serious conditions.
Moderna develops mRNA-based therapeutics and vaccines.
UnitedHealth provides health insurance and services.
AbbVie develops immunology and oncology medicines.
Eli Lilly develops medicines for diabetes and oncology.
Bristol-Myers develops biopharmaceutical products.
AstraZeneca develops medicines in oncology and cardiology.
Sanofi develops medicines and vaccines worldwide.
Intuitive Surgical develops robotic surgical systems.
Medtronic develops medical devices and therapies.
Vertex develops therapies for serious diseases.
Zoetis develops medicines and vaccines for animals.
NIO designs and manufactures electric vehicles in China.
Rivian builds electric vehicles and accessories.
Lucid manufactures luxury electric vehicles.
BYD manufactures electric vehicles and batteries.
Toyota manufactures vehicles and hybrid technology.
Honda manufactures automobiles and motorcycles.
General Motors manufactures vehicles and auto parts.
Ford manufactures automobiles and commercial vehicles.
Stellantis manufactures vehicles and brands globally.
Volkswagen manufactures vehicles and mobility services.
PACCAR manufactures heavy duty trucks and components.
Magna supplies auto parts and contract manufacturing.
Lear manufactures seating and electrical systems.
BorgWarner supplies powertrain and propulsion systems.
Aptiv provides vehicle architectures and safety systems.
BMW manufactures premium vehicles and motorcycles.
Porsche manufactures performance vehicles.
Ferrari designs and manufactures luxury sports cars.
Tata Motors manufactures passenger and commercial vehicles.
Nissan manufactures vehicles and mobility services.
